comments: I really appreciated how we did a practice test in class and she gave us individual comments. Overall, she was okay. I was disappointed in her lack of an open door policy (which is supposed to be traditional for faculty at Dal Law). But I like how she had Prof. Yogis (emeritus) sub for classes instead of making us do double header make up classes.

She seems bored with the subject matter and calls on people incessantly to go over each case read for that day. I like to be taught by the professor, not my fellow classmates or myself at home. The class is stressful, and her method makes it hard for me to pay attention.
As long as you\'re okay doing all the learning on your own, then you\'ll be fine with her.
